summary.span: Provides standard facilities for creating and managing a type-safe, ordered collection of objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此集合支持标准的从零开始编制索引。This collection supports standard zero-based indexing. 提供的属性类返回。The property provided by the class returns a . 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何： 操作通过 RowGroups 属性表的行组](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/how-to-manipulate-table-row-groups-through-the-rowgroups-property.md)。For more information, see [How to: Manipulate a Table's Row Groups through the RowGroups Property](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/how-to-manipulate-table-row-groups-through-the-rowgroups-property.md).

MemberSignature.Value: public int Capacity { get; set; }
.property instance int32 Capacity
Public Property Capacity As Integer
public: property int Capacity { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.Capacity : int with get, set

summary.span: Gets or sets the pre-allocated collection item capacity for this collection.

span.span: Gets or sets the pre-allocated collection item capacity for this collection.

value.span: 预先分配的集合项容量为此集合。

span.span: The pre-allocated collection item capacity for this collection.
The default value is **8**.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性表示的项存储在此集合中的预分配槽数，而属性表示集合中当前项的实际数目。The property represents the number of pre-allocated slots for storing items in this collection, whereas the property represents the actual number of items currently in the collection. 值始终是至少与的值一样大。The value of is always at least as large as the value of . 当新添加的集合项导致集合计数超过集合容量，容量会自动增大以容纳新添加的集合项。When newly added collection items cause the collection count to exceed the collection capacity, the capacity is automatically increased to accommodate the newly added collection items. 增加集合容量包括分配其他集合槽，这会导致性能和内存开销。Increasing the collection capacity involves allocating additional collection slots, which incurs both performance and memory overhead. 使用属性来优化集合项的总值或最大数目提前已知的情况下的集合容量。Use the property to optimize the collection capacity in cases where the total or maximum number of collection items is known in advance. 使用方法使集合容量等于当前的集合计数。Use the method to cause the collection capacity to equalized with the current collection count.

exception.span: Raised when an attempt is made to set to a value that is less than the current value of .

span.span: Raised when an attempt is made to set to a value that is less than the current value of .

summary.span: Optimizes memory consumption for the collection by setting the underlying collection equal to the of items currently in the collection.

span.span: Optimizes memory consumption for the collection by setting the underlying collection equal to the of items currently in the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以使用此方法以最小化内存开销的一个集合，尤其是当集合包含的项集的预期可静态。This method can be used to minimize memory overhead for a collection, particularly if the set of items contained by the collection is expected to be static.
